医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
体验感恩可能会延长老年人的寿命哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院的一项新研究表明，感恩可能有助于老年人活得更久。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/Experiencing-gratitude-may-increase-longevity-among-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/Experiencing-gratitude-may-increase-longevity-among-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13de1ae1-b369-4cab-b6c8-28a42ed6a604 Wed, 03 Jul 2024 13:35:59 -0400 Experiencing gratitude may increase longevity among older adults
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：SCOTUS 任期圆满结束对于最高法院与健康相关的案件来说，这是忙碌的一年。除其他问题外，法官们还处理了两起堕胎案件、另一起涉及阿片类药物流行的案件，以及另一起质疑地方是否可以禁止无家可归者在公共场所睡觉的案件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-SCOTUS-term-wraps-with-a-bang.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-SCOTUS-term-wraps-with-a-bang.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0de67ffc-6e7f-4063-a986-ca69b84da0a6 Wed, 03 Jul 2024 12:37:30 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': SCOTUS term wraps with a bang

研究可以帮助药物开发商提高药物的安全性不列颠哥伦比亚大学、麻省理工学院和密歇根大学的研究可以帮助药物开发商提高药物的安全性并减少副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/Research-could-help-drug-developers-improve-the-safety-profiles-of-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/Research-could-help-drug-developers-improve-the-safety-profiles-of-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28d15953-8af5-47dd-a835-77fa6d5c9916 Wed, 03 Jul 2024 07:54:15 -0400 Research could help drug developers improve the safety profiles of medications
免疫细胞之间的通讯受损导致女性阿尔茨海默病患者认知障碍安·罗姆尼神经疾病中心的主要作者 Neta Rosenzweig 博士和安·罗姆尼中心和 Gene Lay 免疫学和炎症研究所的资深作者 Oleg Butovsky 博士分享了他们论文《性别依赖性 APOE4 中性粒细胞》中的关键信息-小胶质细胞相互作用导致阿尔茨海默氏病的认知障碍”发表在《自然医学》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/Impaired-communication- Between-immune-cells-leads-to-cognitive-impairment-in-female-Alzheimers-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/Impaired-communication- Between-immune-cells-leads-to-cognitive-impairment-in-female-Alzheimers-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b17f498-18d9-4622-9494-142a9b0500fc Wed, 03 Jul 2024 07:47:27 -0400 Impaired communication between immune cells leads to cognitive impairment in female Alzheimer's patients
运动可增强乳腺癌患者的抗肿瘤白细胞芬兰图尔库大学的一项新研究表明，30分钟的运动可以增加乳腺癌患者血液中抗肿瘤白细胞的比例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/Exercise-boosts-tumor-killing-white-blood-cells-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/Exercise-boosts-tumor-killing-white-blood-cells-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0be39e85-ee19-45a4-9dd2-45ca46d84f11 Wed, 03 Jul 2024 07:38:28 -0400 Exercise boosts tumor-killing white blood cells in breast cancer patients
新的人工智能工具可以帮助癌症患者选择最合适的治疗方法澳大利亚国立大学（ANU）的研究人员开发了一种新的人工智能（AI）工具，可以帮助癌症患者选择最合适的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/New-AI-tool-can-help-select-the-most-suitable-treatment-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/New-AI-tool-can-help-select-the-most-suitable-treatment-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53a7f838-41e6-4056-9fd7-a64556e709da Wed, 03 Jul 2024 07:12:40 -0400 New AI tool can help select the most suitable treatment for cancer patients

超越经前综合症：一种人们知之甚少的疾病对一些女性来说意味着一段时期的绝望大多数情况下，科里·林特都很高兴。她白天担任软件工程师，晚上担任兼职大提琴手，利用直排轮滑、园艺以及与朋友的长谈来度过空闲时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/Beyond-PMS-A-poorly-understood-disorder-means-periods-of-despair-for-some-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240703/Beyond-PMS-A-poorly-understood-disorder-means-periods-of-despair-for-some-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ac9b8ee-9847-48c4-ae15-b39aa21ceac6 Wed, 03 Jul 2024 07:02:43 -0400 Beyond PMS: A poorly understood disorder means periods of despair for some women
